titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of George Thomas "Mickey" Leland.
Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of George Thomas "Mickey" Leland.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend that the U.S. Postal Service issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of former Representative George Thomas "Mickey" Leland.
